items.summary: Update the service pricing data to use the new tiered pricing packages (in INR) exactly as provided: YouTube Thumbnail — ₹199–299; Instagram Reel Cover — ₹149–199; Logo Design — ₹399–699; Social Media Post — ₹149; Banner Design — ₹299.

Update the Services page copy to present the pricing as packages by changing the main heading from "Our Services" to "Our Pricing" and ensure all displayed prices reflect the updated tiered INR packages.
Ensure all other UI surfaces that display service pricing use the updated tiered INR package values, including the Order form service dropdown and the Home page service preview section.
